overview: Travis Pastrana is hosting, Hubert Rowland built the track and we got some crazy people to sign up. Introducing the 2022 Pastranaland Pit Bike Championship featuring the Viper Pit 2.0, Hubertcross, Best Trick and Step-Up competition. Who's taking home the crown and the cash?!
title: 2022 Pastranaland Pit Bike Championship
